languages.text: {n}Неуклюжие попытки губернатора держаться в седле, как и отсутствие благородной стати, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вызывают в вас недоумение{/d}. Видимо, воспитание тассерианского дворянства столь же убого, как и технологии этого мира.{/n}

{n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing are {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неуклюжие попытки губернатора держаться в седле, как и отсутствие благородной стати, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вызывают в вас недоумение{/d}. Видимо, воспитание тассерианского дворянства столь же убого, как и технологии этого мира.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

{n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of a noble's dignity is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

{n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

{n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing are {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

languages.text: {n}总督以笨拙的动作骑在马鞍上，完全没有一丁点文雅的风度，这{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}让你完全无法理解{/d}。看来，塔瑟拉贵族阶级的教养水平与这个世界的技术水平同样低劣，不值一提。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing are {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}总督以笨拙的动作骑在马鞍上，完全没有一丁点文雅的风度，这{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}让你完全无法理解{/d}。看来，塔瑟拉贵族阶级的教养水平与这个世界的技术水平同样低劣，不值一提。{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督の鞍にしがみつこうとするほどの不器用さと、貴族らしさが全くない様子は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}あなたを困惑させる{/d}。どうやらタッセーラ人の貴族教育は、この惑星の技術的状況と同じく発達していないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing are {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督の鞍にしがみつこうとするほどの不器用さと、貴族らしさが全くない様子は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}あなたを困惑させる{/d}。どうやらタッセーラ人の貴族教育は、この惑星の技術的状況と同じく発達していないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los torpes intentos del gobernador por mantenerse sobre la silla y la ausencia completa de nobleza en su postura {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}te resultan desconcertantes{/d}. Parece que la educación de la aristocracia thasseriana deja tanto que desear como su nivel tecnológico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing are {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los torpes intentos del gobernador por mantenerse sobre la silla y la ausencia completa de nobleza en su postura {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}te resultan desconcertantes{/d}. Parece que la educación de la aristocracia thasseriana deja tanto que desear como su nivel tecnológico.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die ungeschickten Versuche des Gouverneurs, im Sattel zu bleiben, und sein völliger Mangel an adligen Umgangsformen sind {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}verwirrend für dich{/d}. Anscheinend ist die Erziehung der Aristokratie auf Thassera ebenso wenig beeindruckend wie der technologische Stand dieser Welt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing are {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die ungeschickten Versuche des Gouverneurs, im Sattel zu bleiben, und sein völliger Mangel an adligen Umgangsformen sind {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}verwirrend für dich{/d}. Anscheinend ist die Erziehung der Aristokratie auf Thassera ebenso wenig beeindruckend wie der technologische Stand dieser Welt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Valinin eyerden düşmemek için yaptığı beceriksiz hamleler ve kendisinin asil bir duruştan tamamen yoksun oluşu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}seni hayrete düşürüyor{/d}. Görünen o ki Thassera aristokratlarının yetiştirilme tarzı, tıpkı bu dünyanın teknoloji seviyesi gibi etkileyicilikten oldukça uzak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's clumsy attempts to stay in the saddle and his utter lack of noble bearing are {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}bewildering to you{/d}. It appears that the upbringing of the Thasserian aristocracy is as unimpressive as this world's technological state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Valinin, eyerden düşmemek için yaptığı beceriksiz hamleler ve kendisinin asil bir duruştan tamamen yoksun oluşu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}seni hayrete düşürüyor{/d}. Görünen o ki Thassera aristokratlarının yetiştirilme tarzı, tıpkı bu dünyanın teknoloji seviyesi gibi etkileyicilikten oldukça uzak.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les tentatives maladroites du gouverneur pour rester en selle et son manque criant de panache vous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}laissent sans voix{/d}. Visiblement, l'éducation prodiguée à l'aristocratie de Thassera est à peu près aussi indigente que son niveau de développement technologique.{/n}
